name: Cat Pack
description:
Controls
  • WSAD to move your character
  • Space to stop time
  • Click on cats to order them to move and shoot

An arcade action game where you herd your cats and instruct them to move and shoot. You can also pause time for several seconds, which should make ordering your cats easier. You get points by killing the baddies.

Made as an entry to the Ludum Dare 41 compo, for the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". This is my take with turn-based and real-time action, as well as the concept of herding and cats.

Other Stuff

Used sfxr for sound effects, and West England font by Kevin Richey.
